name: Feed Franklin
description:
A MONSTER IS TERRORIZING THE VILLAGE!

Even now, it moves though our fair town (W A S D)
Hunger drives it to feed on all in its wake! (SPACE)
 Villager flesh will only force it to pursue evermore frequent acts of unspeakable evil!

 It will seek out a place to hide.
The windmill, probably.
I don't know... We're terrified.

 Seriously, don't just stand around and let him eat you, your chickens, pies and other assorted goods left laying around town

ENTRY FOR MAXIMUM MONSTER MONTH

PROJECT SOURCE ON BIT BUCKET

CREDITS
Art n' Stuff: Justin Baker
Scripting 'n Things: Mark Mayer
